name: Demo App
title: Demo Web3 App
subtitle: A demo to demonstrate cross-chain deposit with meson
section_1_desc: to any web3 apps with almost zero fee & slippage.
section_2_steps: Click the Deposit with meson button below
Complete cross-chain transfer in the popup window
section_2_desc: In this demo, you can use stablecoins from any chain and transfer them directly to app's smart contract on Polygon. This example contract will forward receiving tokens to the sender's address on Polygon.

name: MyShell
title: Demo for MyShell
subtitle: A demo to demonstrate cross-chain deposit with alls.to
section_2_steps: Click the Pay to MyShell button below
Complete cross-chain transfer in the popup window
section_2_desc: In this demo, you can use stablecoins from any chain and transfer them directly to MyShell.
